name: Strike
tag_list: baseball, social-network, instruction, lessons, pitching, hitting, catching, fielding
overview:
Strike is an online baseball community of players, coaches, instructors and parents that provides a library of free resources and free video analysis by professionals.

Strike takes the experience of a traditional facility, which typically cost upwards of $1-2/minute, and translates it to an interactive online learning center - for free. Players can interact with friends, coaches and instructors, gaining valuable lessons and advice to further their abilities.

Coaches can set up team pages, invite players and parents and post rosters, schedules, stats, announcements and start discussions through a forum format. Parents can coordinate for rides and find new ways to become involved with the team.

With a library of free resources and high definition instructional videos, regular articles and full social network capabilities, Strike is the online source for baseball instruction.
